snippet: Yahoo, the Internet search engine turned news and multimedia portal, will unveil its first season of scripted comedy programming on Monday.
abstract: Yahoo plans to unveil its first season of scripted comedy programming with an approach that mirrors television networks and reflects changing attitudes on the creative side about how to approach original Internet content.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo, the Internet search engine turned news and multimedia portal, will unveil its first season of scripted comedy programming on Monday.

headline.seo: Yahoo Starts Its First Season of Scripted Comedy Programming
headline.main: Yucking It Up on Yahoo, Like a Grown-Up
headline.print_headline: Yucking It Up on Yahoo, Like a Grown-Up
